articles.author: Seb Starcevic, Eric Bazail-Eimil, Jack Detsch
articles.title: Donald Trump Jr.’s visit was ‘staged,’ says Greenland lawmaker - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We know how they treat the Inuit in Alaska. Make that great before trying to invade us,” Pipaluk Lynge tells POLITICO.
articles.content: Alaska Natives part of the indigenous peoples who inhabit North Americas Arctic regions, like the Greenlandic Inuit face a wide range of economic, education and health disparities, including some of … [+1343 chars]
